channel.title: java on Developer Playground
channel.description: Recent content in java on Developer Playground

item.title: Java Lambda
item.description: Before using lamda Collections.sort(logs, new Comparator<FaceRecognition>() { @Override public int compare(FaceRecognition o1, FaceRecognition o2) { Float f1 = o1.getScore(); Float f2 = o2.getScore(); return f2.compareTo(f1); } }); After using lamda

item.title: Sprint Boot tips
item.description: Building gradlew bootjar Running Normal java -jar client.jar Profile: dev java -Dspring.profiles.active=dev -jar client.jar Systemd script [Unit] Description=My client After=syslog.target network.target mysql.service [Service] Type=simple User=devplayg Group=devplayg WorkingDirectory=/home/devplayg/client ExecStart=/usr/local/jdk/bin/java -Xms128m -Xmx256m -jar smartfactory.
